Publication plans# The present project visualized distribution

U# S# Office of Education whether it would itself prefer to publish
the results, or would prefer to have them published by the NAEB or
the consultant# In 'view of the widespread interest in and need for
this type of material and the already distinguished international
reputation of the proposed consultant as a scholar of the media, no
difficulty in securing commercial publication is anticipated if
that procedure is preferred#
V# Personnel# As consultant we propose Dr. Herbert Marshall McLuhan,
Professor of English at the University of Toronto^,co-editor of Explorations
magazine, and distinguished media specialist, lecturer, and author who has
done much work in the field of relating media study to educational procedures#
Vie know of no other individual qualified as well to undertake the profound
inter-media development outlined here# He is prepared to undertake this
project and to finalize the findings into publishable form, supplemented by
materials to be made available on tape and film# Briefer base-line experi¬
ments in inter-media values have already been conducted and reported on in
